title: Mini Dialer for Android Wear
summary: Mini Dialer allows you to initiate phone calls from your Android Wear watch.
developerAddress:
16130 W Desert Bloom St
Goodyear, AZ 85338
description: Mini Dialer is a phone dialer that allows you to initiate phone calls from your Android Wear watch.Simply open the Mini Dialer app or say 'Open Mini Dialer' on the watch to get started.Features:* Make outbound calls from your watch* End phone calls from your Android Wear watch* Standard dialer interface with number pad input* Setting to enable auto speakerphone* Supports the LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Moto 360, and other Android Wear watch devices* Clean and modern user interface If you have any questions please contact:androidtouchdev [at] gmail.comThanks!
descriptionHTML:
Mini Dialer is a phone dialer that allows you to initiate phone calls from your Android Wear watch.
Simply open the Mini Dialer app or say 'Open Mini Dialer' on the watch to get started.

Features:
* Make outbound calls from your watch
* End phone calls from your Android Wear watch
* Standard dialer interface with number pad input
* Setting to enable auto speakerphone
* Supports the LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Moto 360, and other Android Wear watch devices
* Clean and modern user interface

If you have any questions please contact:
androidtouchdev [at] gmail.com

Thanks!
comments: Not too shabby I was gonna issue a refund but....There aren't that many dialers and I've tried a few. This is probably gonna be the one. I understand not many use the pound key but I do please add that. And also give us the ability to select themes or colors. Then 5 stars
Nearly perfect Beautifully presented app that is a joy to use. Certainly the best I've tried. Just needs phone to be forced to speaker mode when answering from the watch, then it would be perfect.
Nice but missing option To enable the call to use watch for some android wear watched that have a speaker. Will give 5 stars when it does.
Great app! This should be included as a basic part of Android Wear! Pictures for speed dial is a nice addition!
?? When accepting calls is there a way to automatically have the phone turn on  speakerphone, as of now that does not work even when option checked to allow speakerphone
Incoming call notification quit working motto 360 HTC m8
recentChanges: Option for wear notification that shows call info & hangup button for all phone calls(including calls made without the app too).
Delete speed dials in phone app via long press.
Please configure the speed dials in the phone app via the 'Speed Dial' menu item.
